entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
